text: Samuel Ernest Vandiver Jr. (July 3, 1918 â€“ February 21, 2005) was an American Democratic politician who was the 73rd Governor of Georgia from 1959 to 1963. Before that, he was the 3rd Lieutenant Governor from 1955 to 1959. He was a segregationist.
